SEARCH
Package boundary

Class UserBoundary

java.lang.Object
utils.Base
boundary.BaseBoundary
boundary.UserBoundary
Direct Known Subclasses:
StudentBoundary, SupervisorBoundary
public class UserBoundary extends BaseBoundary
This class represents the UserBoundary that handles the login screen and directs users to their respective screens. It extends the BaseBoundary class and takes a CentralManager object as a parameter.
Since:
2023-04-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Esther Teo Gek Wat

  • Method Details

    • login

      public void login()
      Displays the login screen and allows users to enter their credentials to log in to the system. Directs users to their respective screens based on their user type.
